interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk Review Date: 2021/11/25 Store: Method Product Description: ["המשקפיים יותר מלאות למחצה. בקבוקי כביסה ביד, גם. יתרה מכך, מלא לחלוטין. ולשם כך, אנו מציעים את המילוי הזה. הוא מלא מספיק ג'ל לשטיפת ידיים כדי למלא את הבקבוק שלך כמעט 3 פעמים (2.8x ליתר דיוק). בנוסף, שטיפת היד שלנו מיוצרת עם נוסחה מתכלה המופעלת על ידי חומרי ניקוי על בסיס צמחי ומרכיבים מתחשבים אחרים, וללא פרבנים או פתלטים. אז מלאו אותו. מכיוון שהדבר היחיד שגרוע יותר מידיים לא מספיק נקיות הוא שימוש בניגוב מכנסיים כפתרון ביניים.النظارات أفضل نصف كامل. زجاجات غسيل يدوي أيضاً. الأفضل من ذلك، كامل تمامًا. ولهذا السبب، نقدم هذه التعبئة. مليء بما فيه الكفاية للغسيل اليدوي من الجل لإعادة ملء زجاجتك تقريبًا 3 مرات (2.8 × على وجه التحديد). بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن غسول اليد الخاص بنا مصنوع من تركيبة قابلة للتحلل البيولوجي معززة بمنظفات نباتية ومكونات أخرى مدروسة وخالية من البارابين أو الفثالات. لذا املأها. لأن الشيء الوحيد أسوأ من تنظيف اليدين غير الكافي هو استخدام مسح السراويل كحل مؤقت.眼鏡較半飽。 也可以手洗。 更好的是,完全飽滿。 為此,我們提供此筆芯。 充滿足夠的洗手凝膠,可補充您的瓶子幾乎 3 次(準確 2.8 倍)。 此外,我們的洗手液採用可生物降解的配方,由植物性清潔劑和其他周到的成分製成,不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 所以請填寫 'er'。 因為唯一比雙手清潔不足更糟糕的是使用褲子擦拭作為臨時解決方案。 \u200b"] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Method', 'Scent': 'Waterfall', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 7.48 x 3.31 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ME-395B', 'UPC': '885376710056', 'Manufacturer': 'Alere'} Review Text: Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk

I love the shape of the bottle, the color and the mild sweet scent. The soap was fairly thick. It was adequately sudsy. What I hated was the pump. I couldn't do just a slight push (if I only wanted a small amount). It was hard to push just slightly down. It was easier to give it just one full push but that squirted out too much soap. I suppose manufacturers make it that way so the product gets used up quickly. I replaced the pump head with another pump head (salvaged from my other pump bottles) that was easier to push down. Review Title: Love the soap, hate the pump head Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} Nice green color with a refreshing cucumber scent. This feels light, not greasy and yet is very effective at moisturizing skin. It's quickly absorbed by my skin. I like that it doesn't have any AHA or retinol so that I can use this day or night in combination with different serums. light but very effective Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} I like that the particles are much finer than those in other facial scrubs. Other facial scrubs I've tried have coarser particles, so coarse it feels like I'm rubbing sand on my face.

What I don't like is that the product I received will expire in less than 3 months - Oct 2020. This doesn't seem to be just a one-time occurrence. I also purchased the "Higher Education MBA Night Renewing Serum with 0.5% retinol". That one expires even sooner - on Sep 2020.

I don't know what Amazon's policy is on expiration dates for skin care products. But, if I were purchasing this from a physical store, I wouldn't get something that expires in less than 3 months. I expect a product to be good for at least a year. Granted, expired doesn't automatically mean that a product is unusable. However, customers don't like getting old stock especially when a customer still has to pay full price for it. I didn't it but, if I were, I'd be annoyed enough to return the item.

I also don't know if Higher Education regularly sends soon-to-expire items to Amazon or if they're just doing this to Vine purchases. Either way, that's really not good practice. For a facial scrub that costs $25, I don't expect the seller to pass off expiring products on me.
UPDATE - After going through reviews of the two Higher Education products, it appears that they regularly send soon-to-expire products to customers. Bad seller - Higher Education. Really really bad.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should return the product. expires in less than 3 months MBA Renewing Retinol Serum, 1.7 fl. oz, 0.5% Retinol Hydrates & Brightens Skin's Appearance by Diminishing the Look of Breakouts, Hyperpigmentation, and Signs of Aging by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.4 x 1.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381034009'} Received July 23, 2020.

I use this 2x a week in the evenings after applying hyaluronic serum. I've experienced no allergic reaction. I chose this because the retinol concentration (0.5%) isn't too high.

This is the second Higher Education skin care product I've purchased that has a very short expiration period - expires in less than 2 months (Sep 2020). The first was the "Grinding Away skin polishing scrub" that expires in less than 3 months (Oct 2020).

I'm really annoyed that Higher Education is stocking Amazon with old products. If I were paying full price for this, I would expect to receive "fresh" products - with at least a year before expiration. If I were purchasing this from a physical store, I'd give this back to the counter lady and just look for something else.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should be returning the product. expires in less than 2 months Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, Exfoliating Long Silicone Body Back Brush, Handle Scrubbing Pad, Easy to Clean, Lathers Well, Comfortable Massage for Shower(Green) Lnlofen {'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 7.44 x 1.93 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803786'} Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower

First of all, it's not 30". It's 29" long. One inch isn't much. Whether 29 or 30", it's still too short for a tall guy with long arms. It also doesn't scrub that well. I have a 130-cm (51 inches) nylon exfoliating scrub from Daiso. That one really makes great contact with my back and can also be folded up tight to scrub the rest of my body (arms, neck, etc.). Folding up this Lnlofen scrubber ends up making it to thick and awkward to scrub my neck, arms, etc. Too short, doesn't effectively scrub back, awkward to scrub other parts of body zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Eagle) zelaxy {'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'} zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders

I find these extenders are necessary when wearing medical masks because the ear loops are often too long for me. I had to use the slots closest to the middle to ensure masks fit snugly and don't fall down. I could just tie another loop to make the loops shorter but I prefer using these extenders because they hold the loops better. My ears are small. Loops tend to just get pulled out from behind my ears. Good hold on mask ear loops Baby Safety Cotton Swabs for Infant Baby Kid Ear Nose Clean White Cotton Double Tipped Natural Paper Sticks Spiral Head Multipurpose Cotton Buds Cleaning Sticks (M552) meilamei {'Product Dimensions': '3.31 x 3.31 x 3.27 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Meilamei cotton buds 300 ct

Good. Consistent quality. There are no sticks with missing buds. Having them in a plastic container is also very convenient. It's quite pricey though for cotton swabs though. consistent quality but pricey Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Bouquet Garni body shower white musk

I didn't realize until I tried this that I love the smell of white musk. I'm looking forward to also trying their lotion and body mist in the same scent.

Lathers well. If you're a fan of "white musk", you'll love this Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Bouquet Garni Body Shower Vanilla Musk 520 ml / 17.58 Fl. oz.

I've tried the white musk and vanilla musk scents of this body shower. The vanilla musk smells nice (sweeter smell) but I much prefer the white musk scent.

They both lather well and I didn't have any allergic reaction to either of them. I prefer white musk HWASHIN 12 Pack 3.4oz/100ml Clear Plastic Spray Bottles with White Fine Mist Sprayers for Essential Oils, Perfumes & Aromatherapy (Brush, Funnels, Droppers, Labels & 30ml Measuring Cup Included) HWASHIN {'Brand': 'HWASHIN', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '12.72 x 7.91 x 3.5 inches; 10.05 Ounces'} HWASHIN 3.4-oz plastic spray bottles, 12 pk

I use this for various stuff - cooking oils, essential oils, alcohol. The bottle is good quality but I don't like the spray head. I prefer the gun trigger type because there's little force required to spray. Also, with oils, spray heads don't really work in that you can't get a mist. All you're going to get is a stream of oil unless you dilute that oil. I don't want to dilute my cooking oils so I'm fine with getting just streams instead of mists. spray heads not so good Neck Gaiter Face Mask , Breathing Face Cover, Reusable Cooling Bandana, Washable Scarf (4 Pack Nebula) FCY {'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 5.43 x 1.34 inches; 5.43 Ounces', 'UPC': '700306867573'} FCY (Blue Mars) neck gaiters nebula 4 pk

The colors are very nice. The fabric edges are all finished. They fit very snug against the nose and mouth. The fabric is thin. Coupled with the very snug fit, the outline of your nose and mouth is going to be very visible. Because of the snug fit, talking while wearing this gaiter isn't comfortable.

I got these to provide some blocking against the cold and cold wind. Just as with other gaiters, these aren't meant to filter out very tiny particles like viruses. Nice colors but not too comfy when talking SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz SIMPLIGROWN ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Simpligrown baby powder

This is cornstarch, not talc. It's good for those who don't want to use talc. The downside is that it feels coarse, not silky smooth, when being spread over skin.

I got this primarily because of the container. It looks nicer than the usual all white bottles of baby powder. I just refill from my larger bottles. feels like all other cornstarch Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} Cherry Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK, Refillable 16 oz 2pk

I got these because I wanted the glass bottles to hold and keep filtered water handy near the stove for when I'm cooking need to give what I'm cooking a quick spritz of water. I don't like the nozzle because there are only two spray settings. I much prefer fully adjustable nozzles so I ditched the nozzle the bottle came with and just reused an older one I have. Glass bottle for cooking water Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk Method ["המשקפיים יותר מלאות למחצה. בקבוקי כביסה ביד, גם. יתרה מכך, מלא לחלוטין. ולשם כך, אנו מציעים את המילוי הזה. הוא מלא מספיק ג'ל לשטיפת ידיים כדי למלא את הבקבוק שלך כמעט 3 פעמים (2.8x ליתר דיוק). בנוסף, שטיפת היד שלנו מיוצרת עם נוסחה מתכלה המופעלת על ידי חומרי ניקוי על בסיס צמחי ומרכיבים מתחשבים אחרים, וללא פרבנים או פתלטים. אז מלאו אותו. מכיוון שהדבר היחיד שגרוע יותר מידיים לא מספיק נקיות הוא שימוש בניגוב מכנסיים כפתרון ביניים.النظارات أفضل نصف كامل. زجاجات غسيل يدوي أيضاً. الأفضل من ذلك، كامل تمامًا. ولهذا السبب، نقدم هذه التعبئة. مليء بما فيه الكفاية للغسيل اليدوي من الجل لإعادة ملء زجاجتك تقريبًا 3 مرات (2.8 × على وجه التحديد). بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن غسول اليد الخاص بنا مصنوع من تركيبة قابلة للتحلل البيولوجي معززة بمنظفات نباتية ومكونات أخرى مدروسة وخالية من البارابين أو الفثالات. لذا املأها. لأن الشيء الوحيد أسوأ من تنظيف اليدين غير الكافي هو استخدام مسح السراويل كحل مؤقت.眼鏡較半飽。 也可以手洗。 更好的是,完全飽滿。 為此,我們提供此筆芯。 充滿足夠的洗手凝膠,可補充您的瓶子幾乎 3 次(準確 2.8 倍)。 此外,我們的洗手液採用可生物降解的配方,由植物性清潔劑和其他周到的成分製成,不含對羥基苯甲酸酯或鄰苯二甲酸酯。 所以請填寫 'er'。 因為唯一比雙手清潔不足更糟糕的是使用褲子擦拭作為臨時解決方案。 \u200b"] {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Method', 'Scent': 'Waterfall', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 7.48 x 3.31 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ME-395B', 'UPC': '885376710056', 'Manufacturer': 'Alere'} Method Gel Hand Wash, Waterfall, 12oz, 3pk

I love the shape of the bottle, the color and the mild sweet scent. The soap was fairly thick. It was adequately sudsy. What I hated was the pump. I couldn't do just a slight push (if I only wanted a small amount). It was hard to push just slightly down. It was easier to give it just one full push but that squirted out too much soap. I suppose manufacturers make it that way so the product gets used up quickly. I replaced the pump head with another pump head (salvaged from my other pump bottles) that was easier to push down. Love the soap, hate the pump head
profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Skincare Focus:** The user prioritizes products for dry and sensitive skin, experimenting with gentle exfoliators and low-concentration retinol.
- **Texture Preference:** Prefers lightweight, non-greasy formulas that absorb quickly, maintaining this stance amidst trials.
- **Scent Preference:** Enjoys refreshing white musk and is open to natural scents like cucumber, valuing sensory experiences.
- **Ingredient Sensitivity:** Chooses gentle, versatile options while cautiously navigating product formulations, avoiding stronger actives.
- **Product Effectiveness:** Values efficacy in moisturizing and skin improvement products without irritation, emphasizing the need for fresh stock due to concerns about outdated inventory practices with certain brands.
- **Brand Affinity:** Generally positive towards brands but frustrated by one’s inventory practices; recent interactions highlight a focus on product quality and usability.
- **Personal Care Tools:** Recently expressed disappointment in a back scrubber's performance and found mask strap extenders practical. They prefer adjustable nozzles for spray mechanisms.
- **Recent Purchases:** Seeks gentle, cruelty-free products suitable for sensitive skin with organic ingredients. The user appreciates functional, aesthetically pleasing, and refillable product containers.
- **Recent Interaction:** The user appreciates soap’s consistency and scent but is frustrated by inefficient pump designs, opting to replace them with more user-friendly options, indicating a continued focus on usability and practicality in personal care tools. 

Overall, the user continues to seek effective, gentle solutions that enhance moisture and texture while remaining vigilant about product quality.
